function.name: moveto
function.description: A basic skill that moves the robot from its current position to a specified target position while optionally carrying an object.

robot.description: The name of the robot executing this skill.

name.description: The name of the object the robot is carrying. Set to 'none' if the robot is not carrying any object.

position.description: The target position the robot should move to.

function.name: pick
function.description: A basic skill that allows the robot to pick up an object.

robot.description: The name of the robot executing this skill.

name.description: The name of the object to be picked up.

function.name: place
function.description: A basic skill that allows the robot to put down an object at a specified position.

robot.description: The name of the robot executing this skill.

position.description: The target position the object should be placed.

function.name: polish
function.description: A skill that allows the robot to polish an object.

robot.description: The name of the robot executing this skill.

name.description: The name of the object to be polished.

function.name: unlock
function.description: A skill that allows the robot to unlock an object.

robot.description: The name of the robot executing this skill.

name.description: The name of the object to be unlocked.

function.name: unscrew
function.description: A skill that allows the robot to unscrew an object.

robot.description: The name of the robot executing this skill.

name.description: The name of the object to be unscrewed.

function.name: unwrap
function.description: A skill that allows the robot to unwrap an object.

robot.description: The name of the robot executing this skill.

name.description: The name of the object to be unwraped.

function.name: endplanning
function.description: This function ends the planning. Call this when the planning is completed.

function.name: LoLError
function.description: LoLError: The object's weight exceeds the robot's workload capacity.

function.name: LoOError
function.description: LoOError: Missing object necessary to complete the task.

function.name: foldsheet
function.description: A skill that allows the robot to fold a sheet.

robot.description: The name of the robot executing this skill.

name.description: The name of the object to be unwraped.
